basics.name: Chris Pelatari
basics.label: Blue Fenix Productions
basics.summary: I'm an experienced software developer with over 2 decades experience crafting full-stack web and desktop applications using dotnet technologies including C# and VB.NET. Lately, I've been diving into TypeScript and Node.js, often paired with an ASP.NET Core backend. I'm also proud to be a former Microsoft MVP and a member of the AspInsiders community.

work.summary: At Blue Fenix Productions, I guide projects such as Cancer Couture, blending creative ideas with technology. These projects are a way to build reliable solutions while continually refining my technical skills.

At Cardinal Health, I spearheaded the modernization of legacy systems and led cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact digital transformation projects. I optimized system performance, integrated robust DevOps practices, and enhanced CI/CD workflows, significantly improving product reliability and operational efficiency.

At Velocity Databank, Inc., I started as an intern and steadily worked my way up to CTO over a 22-year journey. Along the way, I led initiatives that improved our operations and technology, always learning and growing with each challenge.

interests.name: Web Development
keywords: I exhibit an exceptional mastery of responsive design by seamlessly incorporating modern web standards, ensuring robust, visually appealing interfaces that consistently deliver high-performance user experiences.

interests.name: DevOps
keywords: Skilled in DevOps automation using YAML to define and manage CI/CD pipelines. Proficient with Azure DevOps, AWS CodePipeline, and GitHub Actions to streamline deployments, enforce best practices, and enable robust infrastructure as code.

interests.name: Backend Development
keywords: API development is a cornerstone of modern software architecture, enabling seamless integration, efficient scaling, and robust communication between services. I guarantee the right solution for the scale of your issue.

interests.name: Support
keywords: I treat every project, regardless of its size, with equal respect and dedication, ensuring maximum availability.
